articles.title: In space, Russians and Americans remain 'dear friends': Astronaut - CNA

articles.title: Brooklyn Beckham wedding guests confirmed - from Gordon Ramsay to Snoop Dogg - The Mirror
articles.description: Brooklyn Beckham, 23, will tie the knot with American actress Nicola Peltz, 27, this weekend in what has been dubbed the celebrity wedding of the year
articles.content:
David and Victoria Beckhams eldest son Brooklyn will marry Nicola Peltz at a star-studded ceremony this weekend.
